snippet.title: Far Cry Classic Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Celebrate the 10th anniversary of Far Cry by reliving the classic shooter that started it all. With graphical enhancements, revamped cutscenes, and a fresh new UI, Far Cry Classic allows players to experience all the action and chilling gameplay that made Far Cry legendary. Choose firepower, strategy, or stealth, and use your freedom in massive open environments. It's never too late to rediscover a classic.

Available now for only $9.99 on PlayStation Network for PlayStation 3. 

http://www.farcrygame.com

Rated Mature: Blood and intense violence.

© 2004--2014 Ubisoft Entertainment. All Rights Reserved. Far Cry, Ubisoft, and the Ubisoft logo are trademarks of Ubisoft Entertainment in the US and/or other countries. Based on Crytek's original Far Cry directed by Cevat Yerli. Powered by Crytek's technology "CryEngine."
